name: Out of his doggy mind
description:
This is our submission for the GMTK 2020 game jam.

The topic was Out Of Control and we went with a doggy gone crazy in a supermarket. Can you manage to leave without falling into irrecoverable debt?

The HTML version is a little buggy for optimal experience please try the PC build (Mainly that it sometimes doesn't register Space/Enter key to start and restart play)
